name: A Journey to School
description:
NOTE: Some browser setups result in portions of the game being out of view. Changing the page zoom can fix this, or an executable is available below if desired.

Not everyone experiences life in the same way! Help you and your brother get to school in a world not designed for everyone by rearranging the environment and interacting with the world around you. As the sister you can move hard to reach objects and help push your brother across unfriendly terrain, but you will soon find that everyone needs a hand. Switch to the brother to manipulate parts of the world that are out of reach to accomplish your goal.

Developed over 3 days for #@GAMERellaJam 2021 and winner of the A Challenge Worth Facing award.
